com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.control

Interface IGameModeListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IGameListener

    public interface IGameModeListener
extends IGameListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void gameEnteredMode(String mode) 
      default void gameExitedMode(String mode) 
      default void gameModeChanged(String mode, boolean active)
      Called when a game mode changes.

    • Method Detail

      • gameModeChanged

        default void gameModeChanged(String mode,
                             boolean active)
        Called when a game mode changes.

        The default implementation will call gameEnteredMode(String) if active is true, or gameExitedMode(String) if active is false.

        Parameters:
        mode - The game mode that changed.
        active - True if the mode is active, false if not.

      • gameEnteredMode

        default void gameEnteredMode(String mode)

      • gameExitedMode

        default void gameExitedMode(String mode)
